title: Top decile expression specificity
text: goal tdespec generate cell specificity scores scRNAseq dataset described Skene et al. (2018). utilises functionality Bioconductor package EWCE generate CTD object containing specificity scores cell type snRNAseq dataset generates files gene set enrichment analyses packages MAGMA LD Score regression.
